scripts.i18n:src: mkdirp translations && format-message extract --out-file translations/en.json src/**.js
scripts.fetch:static: rimraf ./static && mkdirp ./static && git clone https://github.com/ircbloqcc/ircbloq-assets.git static && rimraf ./static/.git
scripts.fetch:all: npm run fetch:drivers && npm run fetch:firmwares && npm run fetch:tools && npm run fetch:static
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dev
scripts.build:dir: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dir
scripts.build:dist: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist
scripts.build:publish: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=publish
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run fetch:all && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist
scripts.dist:ia32: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run fetch:all && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist --arch=ia32
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run fetch:all  && npm run doBuild -- --mode=publish
scripts.publish:ia32: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run fetch:all  && npm run doBuild -- --arch=ia32 --mode=publish
